skills.name: BLITZ
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 25% Chance to Remove Beneficial Effects on each hit.

skills.name: CONSECUTIVE STRIKE
desc: • Deals physical, magic, and true damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance for each ally to gain Perfect Hit for 2 turns.
• Perfect Hit status guarantees a perfect hit on basic attacks.
